DataElement.preferredName: Prior Quinolone Antibiotic Administration Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to whether or not there was prior administration of quinolone antibiotic therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._The basic structure of quinolone is nalidixic acid that has limited therapeutic value.  However, the development of fluorinated quinolones led to new derivative compounds with broad antibacterial activity.  Both DNA gyrase and topoisomerase IV are targets of quinolones._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:The basic structure of quinolone is nalidixic acid that has limited therapeutic value.  However, the development of fluorinated quinolones led to new derivative compounds with broad antibacterial activity.  Both DNA gyrase and topoisomerase IV are targets of quinolones.

Concepts.definition: The basic structure of quinolone is nalidixic acid that has limited therapeutic value.  However, the development of fluorinated quinolones led to new derivative compounds with broad antibacterial activity.  Both DNA gyrase and topoisomerase IV are targets of quinolones.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 1/9/2020: CM Released as part of draft content review

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient used quinolon
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient used quinolone antibiotic therapy within 7 days prior to registration?

DataElement.changeDescription: 1/9/2020: CM Released as part of draft content review
